class_notes: Science & the Nature of Evidence explores why we believe what we do and the role science plays in it.  Students from all majors examine this question--from and individual and broader level-- through the lens of a specific complex societal issue.
course_description: IDS205 addresses: What is the nature of scientific evidence? How does it compare to other types of evidence? What counts as evidence in science? In other disciplines? What are the histories of the answers to these questions? How do they affect our everyday lives?
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4129, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: Eisen/Tulke, Status: Closed
